document_data.name: ''Girdle of Beatification''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''girdle of beatification''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[belt]], gifted by the [[Church of Helm]] to hero [[Thom Wainwright]] of [[Berdusk]] some time before [[1312 DR]].
document_data.Powers: The wearer of the girdle was under constant effects of the ''[[bless]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.History:
At some point before the {{YearlinkName|1312}}, the ''girdle of beatification'' was gifted to Thom Wainwright by the clergy of Helm as a reward for allegedly destroying the [[Unseeing Eye‎‎]] and its [[Blinded Acolytes]] in Berdusk. Thom went on performing many other heroic deeds for the church until falling into debt later in life. The ''girdle of beatification'' was sold off to a renowned cleric [[Mask]].

By 1312 DR, the enchanted belt found its way into hands of [[Elytharra Dinnesmore]], an [[enchantress]] and wife of Speaker [[Ulbrec Dinnesmore]] of [[Targos]] in [[Icewind Dale]].
